text: Raymon Harry Anning (Chinese: 顏理國, 22 July 1930 – 20 December 2020) was a British police officer and civil servant. He was the Commissioner of Police of Hong Kong. In the early 1970s, he was a commander of the Metropolitan Police in Greater London. He was Hong Kong Police commissioner from 1985 to 1989. Anning died on 20 December 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hong Kong people Category:British police officers Category:People from London
title: Raymon Anning
